solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int sumNumbers(TreeNode root) {--newline--        return sum(root, 0);--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--    public int sum(TreeNode n, int s){--newline--        if (n == null) return 0;--newline--        if (n.right == null && n.left == null) return s*10 + n.val;--newline--        return sum(n.left, s*10 + n.val) + sum(n.right, s*10 + n.val);--newline--    }--newline--}
